kiwindiyak nowunata, mathra nothibunata, hangumbara wadan pelak kurutu gawe kolayaka oba, nosithu lesa masitha thula, sangawanamuth oba lowata snehaya, gena panhinda karata, pabanda wadanin wadana arutha gena, akalanka bandimak abhises kala oba, chinthanaye ananthayata, diwa gos pada sithuwam kota, senehe musu kota wiya pada wala, sipa gaththa oba, ahinsaka hada madala..

ehidi pakshaye wruththiya samithi lekamwaraya lesa abhinawayen theri path wu palitha range bandara mahathata siyalu niyojithayin wisin suba pathum pirinamuha.
me gahe hati, eka dehi gediyakwath na newa?"

lankawe wiwidha tharathiram wala tharunayin widesha rakiyawalata yama kalayak indan siduwana deyak nisa ee pilibanda amuththak nathi wunath .
shri lankawe kamkaru panthiye wadath ma paripiditha kotasak wana wathu kamkaruwo, okthobar mula sita dainika wa wirodhatha pawathwamin sitinne owunge dainika watupa degunayak karana lesa illamini.

es. 8336 darana motar rathaya aya wishrama giya 2008 sapthambar 03 da bharadimak nokara ragena gos bhawithaye thabagena athi bawada aya wisin wahanaya yali athpath kara noganna lesata kolambaa disa adhikaranaye naduwak pawara kala illimak prathikshepa wi athi bawada kiya siti wimarshana karyanshaya gunathilaka winisuruwariya wishrama giya dinaye sita wahanaya bhara nodima hethuwen me wana wita rupiyal 1,611,044 yi shatha 11 ka mudalak amathyanshaya magin adala mulya aayathanayata gewa athi athara disa adhikaranaya labadun niyogayak anuwa gunathilaka mahathmiyage wishrama watupen rupiyal 10,000 bagin me wana wita rupiyal 1,90,000 ka mudalak aya karagena athi bawath ee anuwa thawath rupiyal 14,21,044 yi shatha 11 k labiya yuthu bawath pawasuweya.

thama pakshaye manthriwarun 04 deneku ema dhura walin iwath wuye janadhipathiwaraya ho amathya dhura bharagath anekuth pakshaye manthriwarun samaga amanapayen nowana bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pawasanawa.dilan perera, pawithra wanniaarachchi, si.bi. rathnayaka saha mahinda yapa abewardhana thaman wathman aanduwe daru amathya dhurawalin iwath wana bawa eeye prakasha kala.shri lanka nidahas pakshaya saha hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapakshata sahaya pala karana thawath nidahas paksha manthriwarun pirisak kolambaa ada kadawa thibu madhya hamu dekakadi mema manthriwarun 04 dena amathya dhura walin iwath wima sambandhayen adahas pala kala.shri lanka nidahas paksha mulasthanaye ada kadawa thibu madhya hamuwakata ekwu amathya mahinda amarawira kiya sitiye amathya dhurawalin iwath wu manthriwarun saha danata amathya dhura bharagena sitina nidahas paksha manthriwarun athara kisidu gataluwak nomathi bawayi.
